title: 2-Wheeler Scrapping
description: Scrap old bikes/scooters with clear valuation and guidance on required documents.

title: 4-Wheeler Scrapping (Cars)
description: End-of-life car scrapping with compliant handling and documentation support.

title: Heavy Vehicle Scrapping
description: Trucks and buses dismantling with safety-first operations. Pickup depends on distance.

title: Machinery/Plant Dismantling
description: Industrial machinery and plant dismantling with responsible segregation and recycling.

title: Scrap Metal Trading (B2B)
description: Buy/sell industrial scrap metal. Share material type, approximate quantity, and location for a quote.

title: Compliance Support
description: Guidance on document requirements and compliance steps (RVSF status currently in process).
